examples.description: This is my first attempt with a lot of the libraries so I thought something simple but still exciting would be good. So this example is just to dip my feet in and get a minimal animation going.

I've always wanted to try to make some falling text like this. I think it would make a fantastic screensaver. This tests the library's ability to draw a lot of small pieces of text and some minimal processing to generate/animate the falling text.

This is quite a simple test, just some pretty pictures of fish floating around a tank. The only challenge is to make it a pretty as possible. You can however go as far as you want with making it realistic, with bubbles and weeds and animations.
